H0.text: What do we call the fruit of the blackthorn. Damson

H1.text: What do we call the fruit of the blackthorn. Bullace

H2.text: What do we call the fruit of the blackthorn. Plum

H3.text: What do we call the fruit of the blackthorn. Sloe

A4.text: The fruit, called a 'sloe', is a drupe 10–12 millimetres (3⁄8–1⁄2 in) in diameter, black with a purple‑blue waxy bloom, ripening in autumn.
